Uses of Class
com.mongodb.MongoCredential

  • Packages that use MongoCredential 
    Package Description
    com.mongodb
    Main package with core files.

    • Uses of MongoCredential in com.mongodb

      Methods in com.mongodb that return MongoCredential 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MongoCredential MongoCredential.createGSSAPICredential(String userName)
      Creates a MongoCredential instance for the GSSAPI SASL mechanism.
      static MongoCredential MongoCredential.createMongoCRCredential(String userName, String database, char[] password)
      Creates a MongoCredential instance for the MongoDB Challenge Response protocol.
      static MongoCredential MongoCredential.createMongoX509Credential(String userName)
      Creates a MongoCredential instance for the MongoDB X.509 protocol.
      static MongoCredential MongoCredential.createPlainCredential(String userName, String source, char[] password)
      Creates a MongoCredential instance for the PLAIN SASL mechanism.
      MongoCredential MongoURI.getCredentials()
      Gets the credentials
      MongoCredential MongoClientURI.getCredentials()
      Gets the credentials.
      <T> MongoCredential MongoCredential.withMechanismProperty(String key, T value)
      Creates a new MongoCredential as a copy of this instance, with the specified mechanism property added.
      Methods in com.mongodb that return types with arguments of type MongoCredential 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<MongoCredential> MongoClient.getCredentialsList()
      Gets the list of credentials that this client authenticates all connections with

      Creates a Mongo based on a list of replica set members or a list of mongos.
      MongoClient(ServerAddress addr, List<MongoCredential> credentialsList)

      MongoClient(ServerAddress addr, List<MongoCredential> credentialsList, MongoClientOptions options)
